Project Experience

Weathery App - Ionic - Angular Weather app written in TypeScript using Ionic and Angular and served by Node.JS. The app is wrapped in cordova and can be exported to a .apk or a .ipa for android and apple respectively. The weather app utilizes the Weather Underground API from the Weather Channel to supply data about the weather from different states and cities
Alfre-Cation - CodeIgniter - PHP Weather application written in the CodeIgniter PHP Framework. Titled "AlfreCation" for the college town that I am/was based out of for my Undergraduate education, Alfred, NY, the purpose of this was to highlight possible "vacation spots" in the area. However, the humor in this is that since this is a small "stranger-things" kinda town, there ain't really any viable places to vacations. So, the Western-New York area will suffice.
NotBC News Feed - AJAX - PHP Created a web based view to display NBC news headlines for the day. There is functionality to search through the headline text with a search bar, and thanks to JQuery, when clicking on the only button on the page, the "showStaggeredList" function animates the population of the page with the listings of News Stories from NBC
